trans-unit.source: Base type for <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"></xref> and any custom conditions created by users.
When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> that is identical to this instance
When overridden in a derived class, evaluates the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>.
The runtime context the rule is running in.
`true` to show that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> evaluated to `true`; otherwise, `false`.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the dependencies for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> that was used previously in a call to <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate(System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation)"></xref>.
A list of symbols that represent entities read by the condition.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>.
Called when all properties have been given values.
After this call, no properties can be modified.
When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will contain the list of errors encountered.
The instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> that is used to manage the validation of rules and rule conditions.
`true` to show that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> has no errors; otherwise, `false`.
